Photographer: [Photographer's Name] If the photographer's name is not known please indicate IPPA Staff as the Photographer
label: Poland's Chief of Staff Tadeusz Wilecki, (R) at Israel's Museum and Memorial to the Holocaust in Jerusalem, Yad Vashem holds a rifle which was used by members of the Warsaw Ghetto Uprising and found in Gensha Street in 1943 after the resistance was crushed which he presented to the museum.
